ygData.subject: Possilbe Diamond dust solution.
ygData.msgSnippet: If you give scrap metal to Sanfyrd Featherhead (the gnome outside the mines of malfunction) you may possilbe get Timmerman s Fabulous Compacter  Its a
ygData.messageBody:
If you give scrap metal to Sanfyrd Featherhead (the gnome outside the mines of malfunction) you may possilbe get "Timmerman's Fabulous Compacter " Its a container that hold four items and has a combine button. If you ask Sanfryd about the compactor he says 'I don't know. It is in fine condition. I never heard of any tinkerer named Tinmizer. At least you can hold items with it. Just do not press the activation button unless you know what you are doing.'
Since compactors crush things... could it work?

(Please note I'm only level 13 and have neight the compactor or a diamond to try this out on. i read about this on www.everlore.com)

Mten
13th warrior
Fennin Ro
